mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RNUM DESC) ROW_NUM, RNUM, QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGDATE, RES_STATE FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QNA_NUM DESC) RNUM, QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, RES_STATE FROM QNA )ORDER BY ROW_NUM DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RNUM DESC) ROW_NUM, RNUM, QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGDATE, RES_TITLE, RES_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(RES_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as RESDATE, RES_STATE FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QNA_NUM DESC) RNUM, QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, RES_TITLE, RES_CONTENT, RES_DATE, RES_STATE FROM QNA ) WHERE QNA_NUM = #{num}
UPDATE QNA SET RES_TITLE = #{RES_TITLE}, RES_CONTENT = #{RES_CONTENT}, RES_DATE = SYSDATE, RES_STATE ='Y' WHERE QNA_NUM = #{num}
